label: 349. James B. Heyward to [cousin] Marie -- May 20, 1923
description: Letter from James B. Heyward to cousin Marie (last name?) containing extensive Heyward genealogical information and family anecdotes.  Heyward also gives his opinion on marriage between Heyward cousins and its effect on the children's intelligence.  8p.
